content: same as round 13 join colour a between two treble clusters in any mini granny do not join yarn where the squares are joined 2ch and then 2tr in same space now work tr2tog at the point where the next two squares join in exactly the same way as you did in round 1 continue working around the blanket working 3tr in each space remembering to tr2tog at every point where two squares join at the corners work 3tr 2ch 3tr when you have worked all the way around join with a slip_stitch into top of 2ch do not cut yarn round 40 rsd work 1 granny round round 41 rsu work 1 granny round round 42 rsd work 1 granny round round 43 rsu work 1 granny round do not cut yarn round 44 rsu picot edge 3ch 1dc in the same space in the next space 1dc 3ch at the corner 1dc 3ch and and then 3ch then 1dc again in the same 1dc in the same space space and 3ch repeat this continue working around in each space until you and slip_stitch to join sew reach a corner in any remaining ends ta daaa your graceblanket is complete please remember to share with me on social media i really hope you enjoyed making your blanket you can find more of my patterns and lots of free projects on my website www madebyanita co uk @madebyanita madebyanita and in my friendly facebook group www facebook com/groups/madebyanita © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 25 my notes 26 www madebyanita co uk @madebyanita madebyanita join my friendly facebook group www facebook com/groups/madebyanita
